phir naam nikaala gaya, to vah ho gaya phenke huon mein se
to nigal liya use machhalee ne aur vah nindit tha
to yadi na hota allaah kee pavitrata ka varnan karane vaalon mein
to vah rah jaata usake udar mein us din tak, jab sab punah jeevit kiye[1] jaayenge
to hamane phenk diya use khule maidaan mein aur vah rogee[1] tha
aur uga diya us[1] par lataon ka ek vrksh
tatha hamane use rasool banaakar bheja ek laakh, balki adhik kee or
to ve eemaan laaye. phir hamane unhen sukh-suvidha pradaan kee ek samay[1] tak
to (he nabee!) aap unase prashn karen ki kya aapake paalanahaar ke lie to putriyaan hon aur unake lie putr
athava kiya hamane paida kiya hai farishton ko naariyaan aur ve us samay upasthit[1] the
saavadhaan! vaastav mein, ve apane man se banaakar ye baat kah rahe hain
ki allaah ne santaan banaee hai aur nishchay ye mithya bhaashee hain
kya allaah ne praathamikta dee hai putriyon ko, putron par
tumhen kya ho gaya hai, tum kaisa nirnay de rahe ho
to kya tum shiksha grahan nahin karate
athava tumhaare paas koee pratyaksh pramaan hai
to apanee pustak lao, yadi tum satyavaadee ho
aur unhonne bana diya allaah tatha jinnon ke madhy, vansh-sambandh. jabaki jinn svayan jaanate hain ki ve allaah ke samaksh nishchay upasthit kiye[1] jaayenge
allaah pavitr hai un gunon se, jinaka ve varnan kar rahe hain
parantu, allaah ke shudhd bhakt
to nishchay tum tatha tumhaare poojy
tum sab kisee ek ko bhee kupath nahin kar sakate
usake siva, jo narak mein jhonka jaane vaala hai
aur nahin hai ham (farishton) mein se koee, parantu usaka ek niyamit sthaan hai
tatha ham hee (aagyaapaalan ke lie) panktivadhd hain
aur ham hee tasbeeh (pavitrata gaan) karane vaale hain
tatha ve (mushrik) to kaha karate the kih
yadi hamaare paas koee smrti (pustak) hotee, jo pahale logon mein aaee
to ham avashy allaah ke shudhd bhakton mein ho jaate
(phir jab aa gayee) to unhonne quraan ke saath kufr kar diya, atah, sheeghr hee unhen gyaan ho jaayega
aur pahale hee hamaara vachan ho chuka hai apane bheje hue bhakton ke lie
ki nishchay unheen kee sahaayata kee jaayegee
tatha vaastav mein hamaaree sena hee prabhaavashaalee (vijayee) hone vaalee hai
to aap munh pher len unase, kuchh samay tak
tatha unhen dekhate rahen. ve bhee sheeghr hee dekh lenge
to kya, ve hamaaree yaatana kee sheeghr maang kar rahe hain
to jab vah utar aayegee unake maidaanon mein, to bura ho jaayega saavadhaan kiye huon ka savera
aur aap munh pher len unase, kuchh samay tak
tatha dekhate rahen, antatah ve (bhee) dekh lenge
pavitr hai aapaka paalanahaar, gaurav ka svaamee, us baat se, jo ve bana rahe hain
tatha salaam hai rasoolon par
tatha sabhee prashansa, allaah, sarvalok ke paalanahaar ke lie hai
saad. shapath hai shikshaaprad quraan kee
balki, jo kaafir ho gaye, ve ek garv tatha virodh mein grast hain
hamane vinaash kiya hai inase poorv, bahut-se samudaayon ka. to ve pukaarane lage aur nahin hota vah bachane ka samay
tatha unhen aashchary hua ki aa gaya unake paas, unheen mense ek sachet karane[1] vaala! aur kah diya kaafiron ne ki ye to bada jhootha jaadoogar hai
kya usane bana diya hai sab poojyon ko ek poojy? ye to bade aashchary ka vishay hai
tatha chal diye unake pramukh, (ye) kahate hue ki chalo, drdh raho apane poojyon par. is baat ka kuchh aur hee lakshy[1] hai
hamane nahin sunee ye baat praacheen dharmon mein, ye to bas managhadat baat hai
kya useepar utaaree gaee hai ye shiksha hamaare beech mein se? balki ve sandeh mein hain meree shiksha se. balki unhonne abhee yaatana nahin chakhee hai
athava unake paas hain, aapake atyant prabhutvashaalee pradaata paalanahaar kee daya ke kosh
athava unheen ka hai raajy, aakaashon tatha dharatee ka aur jo kuchh un donon ke madhy hai? to unhen chaahiye ki chadh jaayen (aakaashon mein) rassiyaan taan[1] kar
ye ek tuchchh sena hai, yahaan praajit senaon[1] mein se
jhuthalaaya inase pahale nooh tatha aad aur shaktivaan firaun kee jaati ne
tatha samood aur loot kee jaati evan van ke vaasiyon[1] ne. yahee senaayen hain
in sabhee ne jhuthalaaya rasoolon ko, to meree yaatana sidhd ho gayee
aur ye nahin prateeksha kar rahe hain, parantu ek karkash dhvani kee jisake lie kuchh bhee der nahin hogee
tatha unhonne kaha ki he hamaare paalanahaar! sheeghr pradaan kar de hamaare lie hamaaree (yaatana ka) bhaag haisaab ke din se pahale
aap sahan karen usapar, jo ve kah rahe hain tatha yaad karen hamaare bhakt daavood ko, jo atyant shaktishaalee tha. nishchay vah dhyaanamagn tha
hamane vashvartee kar diya tha parvaton ko, jo usake saath pavitrata gaan karate the, sandhya tatha praatah
tatha pakshiyon ko ekatrit kiye hue, pratyek usake adheen dhyaanamagn rahate the
aur hamane drdh kiya usake raajy ko aur hamane pradaan kee use naboovat tatha nirnay shakti
tatha kya aaya aapake paas do pakshon ka samaachaar, jab ve deevaar phaandakar mehraab (vandana sthal) mein aa gaye

jab unhonne pravesh kiya daavood par, to vah ghabara gaya unase. unhonne kahaah dariye nahin. ham do paksh hain, atyaachaar kiya hai, hamamen se ek ne, doosare par. to aap nirnay kar den hamaare beech saty (nyaay) ke saath tatha anyaay na karen tatha hamen darsha den seedhee raah
ye mera bhaee hai, isake paas ninnaanve bhed hain aur mere paas bhed hai. ye kahata hai ki vah (bhee) mujhe de do aur ye prabhaavashaalee ho gaya mujhapar baat karane mein

daavood ne kahaah usane tumapar avashy atyaachaar kiya, tumhaaree bhed ko (milaane kee) maang karake apanee bhedon mein tatha bahut-se saajhee ek-doosare par etyaachaar karate hain, unake siva, jo eemaan laaye tatha sadaachaar kiye aur bahut thode hain aise log aur daavood ne bhaanp lee ki hamane usakee pareeksha lee hai, to sahasa usane kshama yaachana kar lee aur gir gaya sajde mein tatha dhyaanamagn ho gaya
to hamane kshama kar diya usake lie vah tatha usake lie hamaare paas nishchay saamipy hai tatha achchha sthaan

he daood! hamane tujhe raajy diya hai dharatee mein. atah, nirnay kar, logon ke beech saty (nyaay) ke saath tatha anusaran na kar aakaanksha ka. anyatha, vah kupath kar degee tujhe allaah kee raah se. nihsandeh, jo kupath ho jaayenge allaah kee raah[1] se, to unheen ke lie ghor yaatana hai, is kaaran ki ve bhool gaye haisaab ka din
tatha nahin paida kiya hai hamane aakaash aur dharatee ko tatha jo kuchh unake beech hai, vyarth. ye to unaka vichaar hai, jo kaafir ho gaye. to vinaash hai unake lie, jo kaafir ho gaye agni se
kya ham kar denge unhen, jo eemaan laaye tatha sadaachaar kiye, unake samaan, jo upadravee hain dharatee mein? ya kar denge aagyaakaariyon ko ullanghanakaariyon ke samaan
ye (quraan) ek shoobh pustak hai, jise hamane avatarit kiya hai aapakee or, taaki log vichaar karen usakee aayaton par aur taaki shiksha grahan karen matimaan
tatha hamane pradaan kiya daavood ko sulaimaan (naamak putr). vah ati dhyaanamagn tha
jab prastut kiye gaye usake samaksh sandhya ke samay sadhe hue vegagaamee ghode
to kahaah mainne praathamikta dee in ghodon ke prem ko apane paalanahaar ke smaran par. yahaan tak ki ve ojhal ho gaye
unhen vaapis lao mere paas. phir haath pherane lage unakee pindaliyon tatha gardanon par
aur hamane pareeksha[1] lee sulaimaan kee tatha daal diya usake sinhaasan par ek dhad. phir vah dhyaanamagn ho gaya
usane praarthana keeh he mere paalanahaar! mujhe kshama kar de tatha mujhe pradaan kar aisa raajy, jo uchit na ho kisee ke lie mere pashchaat. vaastav mein, too hee ati pradaata hai
to hamane vash mein kar diya usake lie vaayu ko, jo chal rahee thee dheemee gati se usake aadesh se, vah jahaan chaahata
tatha shaitaanon ko pratyek prakaar ke nirmaata tatha gota khor ko
tatha doosaron ko bandhe hue bediyon mein
ye hamaara pradaan hai. to upakaar karo athava rok lo, koee haisaab nahin
aur vaastav mein, usake lie hamaare paas saamipy tatha uttam sthaan hai
tatha yaad karo hamaare bhakt ayyoob ko. jab usane pukaara apane paalanahaar ko ki shaitaan ne mujhe pahunchaaya[1] hai duhkh tatha yaatana
apana paanv (dharatee par) maar. ye hai sheetal snaan tatha peene ka jal
aur hamane pradaan kiya use usaka parivaar tatha unake saath aur unake samaan, apanee daya se aur matimaanon kee shiksha ke lie
tatha le apane haath mein teeliyon kee ek jhaad tatha usase maar aur apanee shapath bhang na kar. vaastav[1] mein, hamane use paaya dhairyavaan. nishchay, vah bada dhyaanamagn tha
tatha yaad karo hamaare bhakt ibraaheem, ishaaq evan yaaqoob ko, jo karm shakti tatha gyaanachakshoo[1] vaale the
hamane use vishesh kar liya badee visheshata, paralok (aakhirat) kee yaad ke saath
vaastav mein, vah hamaare yahaan uttam nirvaachiton mein se the
tatha aap charcha karen ismaeel, yas evan zulkifl kee aur ye sabhee nirvaachiton mein se the
ye (quraan) ek shiksha hai tatha nishchay aagyaakaariyon ke lie uttam sthaan hai
sthaayee svarg, khule hue hain unake lie (unake) dvaar
ve takiye lagaaye honge unamen. maangenge unamen bahut-se phal tatha pey padaarth
tatha unake paas aankhe seemit rakhanee vaalee samaayu patniyaan hongee
ye hai jisaka vachan diya ja raha tha tumhen, haisaab ke din
ye hai hamaaree jeevika, jisaka koee ant nahin hai
ye hai aur avagyaakaariyon ke lie nishchay bura sthaan hai
narak hai, jisamen ve jaayenge, kya hee bura aavaas hai
ye hai. to tum chakho, khaulata paanee tatha peep
tatha kuchh any isee prakaar kee vibhinn yaatanaayen
ye[1] ek aur jattha hai, jo ghusa aa raha hai tumhaare saath. koee svaagat nahin hai unaka. vaastav mein, ve narak mein pravesh karane vaale hain
ve uttar dengeh balki tum. tumhaara koee svaagat nahin. tum hee aage laaye ho is (yaatana) ko hamaare. to ye bura nivaas hai
(phir) ve kahengeh hamaare paalanahaar! jo hamaare aage laaya hai ise, use duganee yaatana de narak mein
tatha (naarakee) kahengeh hamen kya hua hai ki ham kuchh logon ko nahin dekh rahe hain, jinakee ganana ham bure logon mein kar[1] rahe the
kya hamane unhen upahaas bana rakha tha athava chook rahee hain unase hamaaree aankhen
nishchay saty hai naarakiyon ka aapas mein jhagadana
he nabee! aap kah den: main to maatr sachet karane vaala[1] hoon tatha koee ( sachcha) poojy nahin hai, akele prabhaavashaalee allaah ke siva
vah aakaashon tatha dharatee ka aur jo kuchh un donon ke madhy hai, sabaka paalanahaar, ati prabhaavashaalee, kshamee hai
aap kah den ki ye[1] bahut badee soochana hai
aur tum ho ki usase munh pher rahe ho
mujhe koee gyaan nahin hai, uchch sabha vaale (farishte) jab vaad-vivaad kar rahe the
meree or to maatr isalie vahyee (prakaashana) kee ja rahee hai ki main khula sachet karane vaala hoon
jabaki kaha aapake paalanahaar ne farishton seh main paida karane vaala hoon ek manushy, mittee se
to jab main use baraabar kar doon tatha phoonk doon usamen, apanee or se rooh (praan), to gir jao usake lie sajda karate hue
to sajda kiya sabhee farishton ne ek saath
iblees ke siva, usane abhimaan kiya aur ho gaya kaafiron mein se
allaah ne kahaah he iblees! kis cheez ne tujhe rok diya sajda karane se usake lie, jise mainne paida kiya apane haath se? kya too abhimaan kar gaya athava vaastav mein too oonche logon mein se hai
usane kahaah main usase uttam hoon. toone mujhe paida kiya hai agni se tatha use paida kiya mittee se
allaah ne kahaah too nikal ja yahaan se, too vaastav mein dhikkrt hai
tatha tujhapar meree daya se dooree hai, pralay ke din tak
usane kahaah mere paalanahaar! mujhe avasar de us din tak, jab log punah jeevit kiye jaayenge
allaah ne kahaah tujhe avasar de diya gaya
nirdhaarit samay ke din tak
usane kahaah to tere prataap kee shapath! main avashy kupath karake rahoonga sabako
tere shudhd bhakton ke siva unamen se
allaah ne kahaah to ye saty hai aur main saty hee kaha karata hoon
ki avashy bhar doonga narak ko tujhase tatha jo tera anusaran karenge unasabase
(he nabee!) kah den ki main nahin maang karata hoon tumase isapar kisee paarishramik kee tatha main nahin hoon apanee or se kuchh banaane vaala
nahin hai ye (quraan), parantu ek shiksha, sarvalok vaasiyon ke lie
tatha tumhen avashy gyaan ho jaayega usake samaachaar (tathy) ka, ek samay ke pashchaat
is pustak ka avatarit hona allaah ati prabhaavashaalee, tatvagy kee or se hai
hamane aapakee or ye pustak saty ke saath avatarit kee hai. atah, ibaadat (vandana) karo allaah kee shudhd karate hue usake lie dharm ko

sun lo! shudhd dharm allaah hee ke lie (yogy) hai tatha jinhonne bana rakha hai allaah ke siva sanrakshak, ve kahate hain ki ham to unakee vandana isalie karate hain ki vah sameep kar dengen hamen allaah[1] se. vaastav mein, allaah hee nirnay karega unake beech jisamen ve vibhed kar rahe hain. vaastav mein, allaah use supath nahin darshaata jo bada mithyaavaadee, krtaghn ho
yadi allaah chaahata ki apane lie santaan banaaye, to chun leta usamen se, jise paida karata hai, jise chaahata. vah pavitr hai! vahee allaah akela sabapar prabhaavashaalee hai

usane paida kiya hai aakaashon tatha dharatee ko saty ke aadhaar par. vah lapet deta hai raatri ko din par tatha din ko raatri par tatha vashavartee kiya soory aur chandrama ko. pratyek chal raha hai, apanee nirdhaarit avadhi ke lie. saavadhaan! vahee atyant prabhaavashaalee, kshamee hai

usane tumhen paida kiya ek praan se, phir banaaya useese usaka joda tatha avatarit kiye tumhaare lie pashuon mein se aath jode. vah paida karata hai tumhen tumhaaree maataon ke garbhaashayon mein ek roop mein, ek roop ke pashchaat, teen andheron mein, yahee allaah hai tumhaara paalanahaar, usee ka raajy hai. koee ( sachcha) vandaneey nahin, usake siva. to tum kahaan phiraaye ja rahe ho

yadi tum krtaghn bano, to allaah nisprh hai tumase aur vah prasann nahin hota apane bhakton kee krtaghnata se aur yadi krtagyata karo, to vah prasann ho jaayega tumase aur nahin bojh uthaayega koee uthaane vaala doosaron ka bojh. phir tumhaare paalanahaar hee kee or tumhaara phirana hai. to vah tumhen soochit kar dega tumhaare karmon se. vaastav mein, vah bhalee-bhaanti jaanane vaala hai dilon ke bhedon ko

tatha jab pahunchata hai manushy ko koee duhkh to pukaarata hai apane paalanahaar ko, dhyaanamagn hokar usakee or. phir jab ham use pradaan karate hain koee sukh apanee or se, to bhool jaata hai use, jisake lie vah pukaar raha tha isase poorv tatha bana leta hai allaah ka saajhee, taaki kupath kare usakee dagar se. aap kah kaden ki aanand le le apane kufr ka, thoda sa. vaastav mein, too naarakiyon mein hai

to kya jo aagyaakaaree raha ho raatri ke kshanon mein sajda karate hue tatha khada rahakar, (aur) dar raha ho paralok se tatha aasha rakhata ho allaah kee daya kee, aap kahen ki kya samaan ho jaayenge jo gyaan rakhate hon tatha jo gyaan nahin rakhate? vaastav mein, shiksha grahan karate hain matimaan log hee

aap kah den un bhakton se, jo eemaan laaye tatha dare apane paalanahaar se ki unheen ke lie jinhonne sadaachaar kiye is sansaar mein, badee bhalaee hai tatha allaah kee dharatee vistrt hai aur dhairyavaan hee apana poora pratiphal aganit diye jaayenge
aap kah den ki mujhe aadesh diya gaya hai ki ibaadat (vandana) karoon allaah kee, shudhd karake usake lie dharm ko
tatha mujhe aadesh diya gaya hai ki pratham aagyaakaaree ho jaoon
aap kah den: main darata hoon, yadi main avaigya karoon apane paalanahaar kee, ek bade din kee yaatana se
aap kah den: allaah hee kee ibaadat (vandana) main kar raha hoon, shudhd karake usake lie apane dharm ko

atah tum ibaadat (vandana) karo jisakee chaaho, usake siva. aap kah den: vaastav mein, kshatigrast vahee hain, jinhonne kshatigrast kar liya svayan ko tatha apane parivaar ko pralay ke din. saavadhaan! yahee khulee kshati hai
unheen ke lie chhatr honge agni ke, unake oopar se tatha unake neeche se chhatr honge. yahee hai, dara raha hai allaah jisase, apane bhakton ko. he mere bhakto! mujhee se daro
jo bache rahe taagoot (asur)[1] kee pooja se tatha dhyaanamagn ho gaye allaah kee or, to unheen ke lie shubh soochana hai. atah, aap shubh soochana suna den mere bhakton ko
jo dhyaan se sunate hain is baat ko, phir anusaran karate hain is sarvottam baat ka, to vahee hain, jinhen supath darsha diya hai allaah ne tatha vahee matimaan hain
to kya jisapar yaatana kee baat sidhd ho gayee, kya aap nikaal sakenge use, jo narak mein hain
kintu, jo apane paalanahaar se dare, unheen ke lie uchch bhavan hain. jinake oopar nirmit bhavan hain. pravaahit hain jinamen naharen, ye allaah ka vachan hai aur allaah vachan bhang nahin karata

kya tumane nahin dekha[1] ki allaah ne utaara aakaash se jal? phir pravaahit kar diye usake srot dharatee mein. phir nikaalata hai usase khetiyaan vibhinn rangon kee. phir sookh jaatee hain, to tum dekhate ho unhen peelee, phir use choor-choor kar deta hai. nishchay isamen badee shiksha hai matimaanon ke lie

to kya khol diya ho allaah ne jisaka seena islaam ke lie, to vah ek prakaash par ho apane paalanahaar kee or se. to vinaash hai jinake dil kade ho gaye allaah ke smaran se, vahee khule kupath mein hain

allaah hee hai, jisane sarvottam hadees (quraan) ko avatarit kiya hai. aisee pustak, jisakee aayaten milatee-julatee baar-baar duharaee jaane vaalee hain. jise (sunakar) khade ho jaate hain unake roongate, jo darate hain apane paalanahaar se. phir komal ho jaate hain unake ang tatha dil, allaah ke smaran kee or. yahee hai allaah ka maargadarshan, jisake dvaara vah sammaarg par laga deta hai, jise chaahata hai aur jise allaah kupath kar de, to usaka koee pathadarshak nahin hai
to kya jo apanee raksha karega apane mukh[1] se, buree yaatana se, pralay ke din? tatha kaha jaayega atyaachaariyon seh chakho, jo tum kar rahe the
jhuthala diya unhonne, jo inase poorv the. to aa gayee yaatana unake paas, jahaan se unhen anumaan (bhee) na tha
to chakha diya allaah ne unhen apamaan, saansaarik jeevan mein aur aakhirat (paralok) kee yaatana nishchay atyadhik badee hai. kya hee achchha hota, yadi ve jaanate
aur hamane manushy ke lie is quraan mein pratyek udaaharan diye hain, taaki ve shiksha grahan karen
arabee bhaasha mein quraan, jisamen koee tedhaapan nahin hai, taaki ve allaah se daren

allaah ne ek udaaharan diya hai ek vyakti ka, jisamen bahut-se paraspar virodhee saajhee hain tatha ek vyakti poora ek vyakti ka (daas) hai. to kya dasha mein donon samaan ho jaayenge?[1] sab prashansa allaah ke lie hai, balki unamen se adhiktar nahin jaanate
(he nabee!) nishchay aapako marana hai tatha unhen bhee marana hai
phir tum sabhee[1] pralay ke din allaah ke samaksh jhagadoge
to usase bada atyaachaaree kaun ho sakata hai jo allaah par jhooth bole tatha sach ko jhuthalaaye, jab usake paas aa gaya? to kya narak mein nahin hai, aise kaafiron ka sthaan
tatha jo saty laaye[1] aur jisane use sach maana, to vahee (yaatana se) surakshit rahane vaale hain
unheen ke lie hai, jo vah chaahenge unake paalanahaar ke yahaan aur yahee sadaachaariyon ka pratiphal hai
taaki allaah kshama kar de, jo kukarm unhonne kiye hain tatha unhen pradaan kare unaka pratiphal unake uttam karmon ke badale, jo ve kar rahe the
kya allaah prayaapt nahin hai apane bhakt ke lie? tatha vah aapako daraate hain unase, jo usake siva hain tatha jise allaah kupath kar de, to nahin hai use koee supath darshaane vaala
aur jise allaah supath darsha de, to nahin hai use koee kupath karane vaala. kya nahin hai allaah prabhutvashaalee, badala lene vaala

aur yadi aap, unase prashn karen ki kisane paida kiya hai aakaashon tatha dharatee ko? to ve avashy kahenge ki allaah ne. aap kahiye ki tum batao, jise tum allaah ke siva pukaarate ho, yadi allaah mujhe koee haani pahunchaana chaahe, to kya ye usakee haani door kar sakata hain? athava mere saath daya karana chaahe, to kya ye rok sakate hain usakee daya ko? aap kah den ki mujhe paryaapt hai allaah aur useepar bharosa karate hain, bharosa karane vaale
aap kah den ki he meree jaati ke logo! tum kaam karo apane sthaan par, maimbhee kaam kar raha hoon. to sheeghr hee tumhen gyaan ho jaayega
ki kisake paas aatee hai aisee yaatana, jo use apamaanit kar de tatha utaratee hai kisake oopar sthaayee yaatana

vaastav mein, hamane hee avatarit kee hai aapapar ye pustak, logon ke lie saty ke saath. to jisane maargadarshan praapt kar liya, to usake apane (laabh ke) lie hai tatha jo kupath ho gaya, to vah kupath hota hai apane oopar tatha aap unapar sanrakshak nahin hain

allaah hee kheenchata hai praanon ko, unake maran ke samay tatha jisake maran ka samay nahin aaya, usakee nidra mein. phir rok leta hai jisapar nirnay kar diya ho maran ka tatha bhej deta hai any ko, ek nirdhaarit samay tak ke lie. vaastav mein, isamen kaee nishaaniyaan hain unake lie, jo manan-chintan[1] karate hon
kya unhonne bana lie hain allaah ke atirikt bahut-se abhistaavak (sifaarishee)? aap kah den: kya (ye sifaarish karenge) yadi ve adhikaar na rakhate hon kisee cheez ka aur na hee samajh sakate hon
aap kah den ki anushansa (sifaarish) to sab allaah ke adhikaar mein hai. usee ke lie hai aakaashon tatha dharatee ka raajy. phir usee kee or tum phiraaye jaoge

tatha jab varnan kiya jaata hai akele allaah ka, to sankeern hone lagate hain unake dil, jo eemaan nahin rakhate aakhirat[1] par tatha jab varnan kiya jaata hai unaka, jo usake siva hain, to ve sahasa prasann ho jaate hain
(he nabee!) aap kahen: he allaah aakaashon tatha dharatee ke paida karane vaale, paroksh tatha pratyaksh ke gyaanee! too hee nirnay karega apane bhakton ke beech, jis baat mein ve jhagad rahe the

aur yadi unaka, jinhonne atyaachaar kiya hai, jo kuchh dharatee mein hai, sab ho jaaye tatha usake samaan usake saath aur aa jaaye, to ve use dand mein de denge[1] ghor yaatana ke badale, pralay ke din tatha khul jaayegee unake lie allaah kee or, se vo baat, jise ve samajh nahin rahe the
tatha khul jaayengee unake lie unake karatooton kee buraeeyaan aur unhen gher lega, jisaka ve upahaas kar rahe the

aur jab pahunchata hai manushyon ko koee duhkh, to hamen pukaarata hai. phir jab ham pradaan karate hain koee sukh apanee or se, to kahata haih ye to mujhe pradaan kiya gaya hai gyaan ke kaaran. balki, ye ek pareeksha hai. kintu, logon mein se adhiktar (ise) nahin jaanate
yahee baat, un logon ne bhee kahee thee, jo inase poorv the. to nahin kaam aaya unake, jo kuchh ve kama rahe the
phir aa pade unapar unake sab kukarm aur jo atyaachaar kiye hain inamen se, aa padenge unapar (bhee) unake kukarm tatha ve (hamen) vivash karane vaale nahin hain

kya unhen gyaan nahin ki allaah phailaata hai jeevika, jisake lie chaahata hai tatha naapakar deta hai (jisake lie chaahata hai)? nishchay isamen kaee nishaaniyaan hain, un logon ke lie, jo eemaan rakhate hain

aap kah den mere un bhakton se, jinhonne apane oopar atyaachaar kiye hain ki tum niraash[1] na ho allaah kee daya se. vaastav mein, allaah kshama kar deta hai sab paapon ko. nishchay vah ati kshamee, dayaavaan hai
tatha jhuk pado apane paalanahaar kee or aur aagyaakaaree ho jao usake, isase poorv ki tumapar yaatana aa jaaye, phir tumhaaree sahaayata na kee jaaye
tatha paalan karo us sarvottam (qaraan) ka, jo avatarit kiya gaya hai tumhaaree or tumhaare paalanahaar kee or se, isase poorv ki aa pade tumapar yaatana aur tumhen gyaan na ho
(aisa na ho ki) koee vyakti kahe ki haay santaap! is baat par ki main aalasy kiya allaah ke paksh mein tatha main upahaas karane vaalon mein rah gaya
athava kahe ki yadi allaah mujhe supath dikhaata, to main darane vaalon mein se ho jaata
athava kahe jab dekh le yaatana ko ki yadi mujhe (sansaar mein) phirakar jaane ka avasar ho jaaye, to main avashy sadaachaariyon mein se ho jaoonga
haan, aaeen tumhaare paas meree nishaaniyaan, to tumane unhen jhuthala diya aur abhimaan kiya tatha tum the hee kaafiron mein se
aur pralay ke din aap unhen dekhenge, jinhonne allaah par jhooth bole ki unake mukh kaale honge. to kya narak mein nahin hai abhimaaniyon ka sthaan
tatha bacha lega allaah jo aagyaakaaree rahe, unhen, unakee saphalata ke saath. nahin lagega unhen koee duhkh aur na ve udaaseen honge
allaah hee pratyek vastu ka paida karane vaala tatha vahee pratyek vastu ka rakshak hai
usee ke adhikaar mein hain aakaashon tatha dharatee kee kunjiyaan[1] tatha jinhonne nakaar diya allaah kee aayaton ko, vahee kshati mein hain
aap kah den: to kya allaah se any kee tum mujhe ibaadat (vandana) karane ka aadesh dete ho, he agyaano

tatha vahyee kee gaee hai aapakee or tatha un (nabiyon) kee or, jo aapase poorv (hue) ki yadi aapane shirk kiya, to avashy vyarth ho jaayega aapaka karm tatha aap ho jaayenge[1] kshatigraston mein se
balki aap allaah hee kee ibaadat (vandana) karen tatha krgyayon mein rahen

tatha unhonne allaah ka sammaan nahin kiya, jaise usaka sammaan karana chaahiye tha aur dharatee pooree usakee ek mutthee mein hogee, pralay ke din tatha aakaash lapete hue honge usake haath[1] mein. vah pavitr tatha uchch hai us shirk se, jo ve kar rahe hain

tatha soor (narasindhagha) phoonka[1] jaayega, to nishchet hokar gir jaayenge, jo aakaashon tatha dharatee mein hain. parantu jise allaah chaahe, phir use punah phoonka jaayega, to sahasa sab khade dekh rahe honge

tatha jagamagaane lagegee dharatee, apane paalanahaar kee jyoti se aur prastut kiye jaayenge karm lekh tatha laaya jaayega nabiyon aur saakshiyon ko tatha nirnay kiya jaayega unake beech saty (nyaay) ke saath aur unapar atyaachaar nahin kiya jaayega
tatha poora-poora diya jaayega pratyek jeev ko, usaka karmaphal tatha vah bhalee-bhaanti jaanane vaala hai use, jo ve kar rahe hain

tatha haanke jaayenge, jo kaafir ho gaye narak kee or, jhund banaakar. yahaantak ki jab ve usake paas aayenge, to khol diye jaayenge usake dvaar tatha unase kahenge usake rakshak (farishteh) kya nahin aaye tumhaare paas rasool tumamen se, jo tumhen sunaate, tumhaare paalanahaar kee aayaten tatha sachet karate tumhen, is din ka saamana karane se? ve kahengeh kyon nahin? parantu, sidhd ho gaya yaatana ka shabd, kaafiron par
kaha jaayega ki pravesh kar jao narak ke dvaaron mein, sadaavaasee hokar usamen. to bura hai ghamandiyon ka nivaas sthaan

tatha bhej diye jaayenge, jo log darate rahe apane paalanahaar se, svarg kee or jhund banaakar. yahaantak ki jab ve aa jaayenge usake paas tatha khol diye jaayenge usake dvaar aur kahenge unase usake rakshakah salaam hai tumapar, tum prasann raho. tum pravesh kar jao usamen, sadaavaasee hokar

tatha ve kahengeh sab prashansa allaah ke lie hain, jisane sach kar dikhaaya hamase apana vachan tatha hamen uttaraadhikaaree bana diya is dharatee ka, ham rahen svarg mein, jahaan chaahen. kya hee achchha hai kaaryakartaon[1] ka pratiphal

tatha aap dekhenge farishton ko ghere hue arsh (sinhaasan) ke chaturdik, ve pavitrata gaan kar rahe honge apane paalanahaar kee prashansa ke saath, nirnay kar diya jaayega logon ke beech saty ke saath tatha kah diya jaayega ki sab prashansa allaah, sarvalok ke paalanahaar ke lie hai
haaa meem
is pustak ka utarana allaah kee or se hai, jo sab cheezon aur gunon ko jaanane vaala hai
paap kshama karane, tauba sveekaar karane, kshamaayaachana ka sveekaaree, kadee yaatana dene vaala, samaee vaala, jisake siva koee ( sachcha) vandaneey nahin. usee kee or (sabako) jaana hai
nahin jhagadate hain allaah kee aayaton mein unake siva, jo kaafir ho gaye. atah, dhokhe mein na daal de aapako unakee yaataayaat deshon mein

jhuthalaaya inase poorv, nooh kee jaati ne tatha bahut-se samudaayon ne unake pashchaat tatha vichaar kiya pratyek samudaay ne apane rasool ko bandee bana lene ka tatha vivaad kiya asaty ke sahaare, taaki asaty bana den saty ko. to hamane unhen pakad liya. phir kaisee rahee hamaaree yaatana
aur isee prakaar, sidhd ho gaee aapake paalanahaar kee baat unapar, jo kaafir ho gaye ki vahee naarakee hain

ve (farishte) jo apane oopar uthaaye hue hain arsh (sinhaasan) ko tatha jo usake aas-paas hain, ve pavitrata gaan karate rahate hain apane paalanahaar kee prashansa ke saath tatha usapar eemaan rakhate hain aur kshama yaachana karate rahate hain unake lie, jo eemaan laaye hain.[1] he hamaare paalanahaar! toone gher rakha hai pratyek vastu ko (apanee) daya tatha gyaan se. atah, kshama kar de unako jo kshama maangen tatha chalen tere maarg par tatha bacha le unhen, narak kee yaatana se

he hamaare paalanahaar! tatha pravesh kar de unhen ,un sthaayee svargon mein, jinaka toone unhen vachan diya hai tatha jo sadaachaaree hain, unake poorvajon, patniyon aur unakee santaanon mein se. nishchay too sab cheezon aur gunon ko jaanane vaala hai
tatha unhen surakshit rakh dushkarmon se tatha toone jise bacha liya dushkarmon se us din, to daya kar dee usapar aur yahee badee saphalata hai

jin logon ne kufr kiya hai, unhen (pralay ke din) pukaara jaayega ki allaah ka krodh tumapar usase adhik tha, jitana tumhen aaj apane oopar krodh aa raha hai, jab tum sansaar mein eemaan kee or bulaaye[1] ja rahe the
ve kahengeh he hamaare paalanahaar! toone hamen do baar maara[1] tatha jeevit (bhee) do baar kiya. atah, hamane maan liya apane paapon ko. to kya (yaatana se) nikalane kee koee raah (upaay) hai

(ye yaatana) is kaaran hai ki jab tumhen (sansaar mein) bulaaya gaya akele allaah kee or, to tumane kufr kar diya aur yadi shirk kiya jaata usake saath, to tum maan lete the. to aadesh dene ka adhikaar allaah ko hai, jo sarvochch, sarvamahaan hai
vahee dikhaata hai tumhen apanee nishaaniyaan tatha utaarata hai tumhaare lie aakaash se jeevika aur shiksha grahan nahin karata, parantu vahee, jo (usakee or) dhyaan karata hai
to tum pukaaro allaah ko shudhd karake usake lie dharm ko, yadyapi bura lage kaafiron ko
vah uchch shreniyon vaala arsh ka svaamee hai. vah utaarata hai apane aadesh se rooh[1] (vahyee), jisapar chaahata hai, apane bhakton mein se, taaki vah sachet kare, milane ke din se
jis din sab log (jeevit hokar) nikal padenge. nahin chhupee hogee allaah par unakee koee cheez. kisaka raajy hai aaj?[1] akele prabhutvashaalee allaah ka
aaj pratikaar diya jaayega pratyek praanee ko, usake karatoot ka. koee atyaachaar nahin hai aaj. vaastav mein, allaah ati sheeghr haisaab lene vaala hai

tatha aap saavadhaan kar den unhen aagaamee sameep din se, jab dil munh ko aa rahe honge. log shok se bhare honge. nahin hoga atyaachaariyon ka koee mitr, na koee sifaarishee, jisakee baat maanee jaaye
vah jaanata hai aankhon kee choree tatha jo (bhed) seene chhupaate hain
allaah hee nirnay karega saty ke saath tatha jinhen ve pukaarate hain allaah ke atirikt, ve koee nirnay nahin kar sakate. nishchay allaah hee bhalee-bhaanti sunane-dekhane vaala hai

kya vah chale-phire nahin dharatee mein, taaki dekhate ki kaisa raha unaka parinaam, jo inase poorv the? ve inase adhik the bal mein tatha adhik chinh chhod gaye dharatee mein. to pakad liya allaah ne unhen unake paapon ke kaaran aur nahin tha unake lie allaah se koee bachaane vaala
ye is kaaran hua ki unake paas laate the hamaare rasool khulee nishaaniyaan, to unhonne kufr kiya. antatah, pakad liya unhen allaah ne. vastutah, vah ati shaktishaalee, ghor yaatana dene vaala hai
tatha hamane bheja moosa ko apanee nishaaniyon aur har prakaar ke pramaan ke saath
firaun aur (usake mantree) haamaan tatha qaaroon ke paas. to unhonne kahaah ye to bada jhootha jaadoogar hai

to jab vah unake paas saty laaya hamaaree or se, to sabane kahaah vadh kar do unake putron ko, jo eemaan loye hain usake saath tatha jeevit rahane do unakee striyon ko aur kaafiron ka shadyantr nishphal (vyarth) hee hua

aur kaha firaun ne (apane pramukhon seh) mujhe chhodo, main vadh kar doon moosa ko aur use chaahiye ki pukaare apane paalanahaar ko. vaastav mein, main darata hoon ki vah badal dega tumhaare dharm[1] ko athava paida kar dega is dharatee (misr) mein upadrav
tatha moosa ne kahaah mainne sharan lee hai apane paalanahaar tatha tumhaare paalanahaar kee pratyek ahankaaree se, jo eemaan nahin rakhata haisaab ke din par

tatha kaha ek eemaan vaale vyakti ne firaun ke gharaane ke, jo chhupa raha tha apana eemaanah kya tum vadh kar doge ek vyakti ko ki vah kah raha haih mera paalanahaar allaah hai? jabaki vah tumhaare paas laaya hai khulee nishaaniyaan tumhaare paalanahaar kee or se? aur yadi vah jhootha ho, to usee ke oopar hai unaka jhooth aur yadi sachcha ho, to aa padega vah kuchh, jisakee tumhen dhamakee de raha hai. vaastav mein, allaah maargadarshan nahin deta use, jo ullanghanakaaree bahut jhootha ho

he meree jaati ke logo! tumhaara raajy hai aaj, tum prabhaavashaalee ho dharatee mein, to kaun hamaaree raksha karega allaah kee yaatana se, yadi vah hamapar aa jaaye? firaun ne kahaah main tum sab ko vahee samajha raha hoon, jise main uchit samajhata hoon aur tumhen seedhee hee raah dikha raha hoon
tatha usane kaha, jo eemaan laayaah he meree jaati! main tumapar darata hoon (agale) samudaayon ke din jaise (din)[1] se
nooh kee jaati kee jaisee dasha se tatha aad aur samood kee evan jo unake pashchaat hue tatha allaah nahin chaahata koee atyaachaar bhakton ke lie
tatha he meree jaati! main dar raha hoon tumapar, ek-doosare ko pukaarane ke din[1] se
jis din tum peechhe phirakar bhaagoge, nahin hoga tumhen allaah se koee bachaane vaala tatha jise allaah kupath kar de, to usaka koee path pardarshak nahin

tatha aaye yoosuf tumhaare paas isase poorv khule pramaanon ke saath, to tum baraabar sandeh mein rahe usase, jo tumhaare paas laaye. yahaantak ki jab ve mar gaye, to tumane kaha ki kadaapi nahin bhejega allaah unake pashchaat koee rasool.[1] isee prakaar allaah kupath kar deta hai use, jo ullanghanakaaree daanvaadol ho

jo jhagadate hain allaah kee aayaton mein, bina kisee aise pramaan ke, jo unake paas aaya ho. to ye bade krodh kee baat hai allaah ke sameep tatha unake sameep, jo eemaan laaye hain. isee prakaar, allaah muhar laga deta hai pratyek ahankaaree atyaachaaree ke dil par
tatha kaha firaun ne ki he haamaan! mere lie bana do ek uchch bhavan, sambhavatah main un maargon tak pahuch sakoon

aakaash ke maargon tak, main dekhoon moosa ke poojy (upaasy) ko aur nishchay main use jhootha samajh raha hoon aur isee prakaar, shobhaneey bana diya gaya firaun ke lie usaka dushkarm tatha rok diya gaya sammaarg se aur firaun ka shadyantr vinaash hee mein raha
tatha usane kaha jo eemaan laayaah he meree jaati! meree baat maano, main tumhen seedhee raah bata raha hoon
he meree jaati! ye saansaarik jeevan kuchh saamyik laabh hai tatha vaastav mein, paralok hee sthaayee nivaas hai

jisane dushkarm kiya, to use usee ke samaan pratikaar diya jaayega tatha jo sukarm karega; nar athava naaree mein se aur vah eemaan vaala (ekeshvaravaadee) ho, to vahee pravesh karenge svarg mein. jeevika diye jaayenge usamen aganit
tatha he meree jaati! kya baat hai ki main bula raha hoon tumhen mukti kee or tatha tum bula rahe ho mujhe narak kee or
tum mujhe bula rahe ho, taaki main kufr karoon allaah ke saath aur saajhee banaoon usaka use, jisaka mujhe koee gyaan nahin hai tatha main bula raha hoon tumhen, prabhaavashaalee, ati kshamee kee or

nishchit hai ki tum jisakee or moojhe bula[1] rahe ho, vah pukaarane yogy nahin hai, na lok mein, na paralok mein tatha hamen jaana hai allaah hee kee or tatha vaastav mein, atikramee hee naarakee hain
to tum yaad karoge, jo main kah raha hoon tatha main samarpit karata hoon apana maamala allaah ko. vaastav mein, allaah dekh raha hai bhakton ko
to allaah ne use surakshit kar diya, unake shadyantr kee buraeeyon se aur gher liya firauniyon ko buree yaatana ne
ve[1] prastut kiye jaate hain agni par, praatah tatha sandhya tatha jis din pralay sthaapit hogee, (ye aadesh hoga) ki daal do firauniyon ko kadee yaatana mein
tatha jab ve jhagadenge agni mein, to kahenge nirbal unase, jo bade banakar raheh ham tumhaare anuyaayee the, to kya tum, door karoge hamase agni ka kuchh bhaag
ve kahenge, jo bade banakar raheh hamasab iseemen hain. allaah nirnay kar chuka hai bhakton (bandon) ke beech
tatha kahenge jo agni mein hain, narak ke rakshakon seh apane paalanahaar se praarthana karo ki hamase halkee kar de kisee din, kuchh yaatana
ve kahengeh kya nahin aaye tumhaare paas, tumhaare rasool, khule pramaan lekar? ve kahengeh kyon nahin? ve kahengeh to tum hee praarthana karo aur kaafiron kee praarthana vyarth hee hogee
nishchay ham sahaayata karenge apane rasoolon kee tatha unakee, jo eemaan laayen, saansaarik jeevan mein tatha jis din[1] saakshee khade honge
jis din nahin laabh pahunchaayegee atyaachaariyon ko unakee kshama yaachana tatha unheen ke lie dhikkaar aur unheen ke lie bura ghar hai
tatha hamane pradaan kiya moosa ko maargadarshan aur hamane uttaraaghikaaree banaaya israeel kee santaan ko pustak (tauraat) ka
jo maargadarshan tatha shiksha thee samajh vaalon ke lie

to (he nabee!) aap dhairy rakhen. vaastav mein, allaah ka vachan[1] saty hai tatha kshama maangen apane paap[2] kee tatha pavitrata ka varnan karate rahen apane paalanahaar kee prashansa ke saath, sandhya aur praatah

vaastav mein, jo jhagadate hain allaah kee aayaton mein, bina kisee pramaan ke, jo aaya[1] ho unake paas, to unake dilon mein badaee ke siva kuchh nahin hai, jis tak ve pahuchane vaale nahin hain. atah, aap allaah kee sharan len. vaastav mein, vahee sab kuchh sunane-jaanane vaala hai
nishchay aakaashon tatha dharatee ko paida karana, adhik bada hai, manushy ko paida karane se. parantu, adhiktar log gyaan nahin rakhate
tatha samaan nahin hota andha tatha aankh vaala aur na jo eemaan laaye aur satkarm kiye hain aur dushkarmee. tum (bahut) kam hee shiksha grahan karate ho
nishchay, pralay aanee hee hai. jisamen koee sandeh nahin. parantu, adhiktar log eemaan (vishvaas) nahin rakhate

tatha kaha hai tumhaare paalanahaar ne ki mujheese praarthana[1] karo, main tumhaaree praarthana sveekaar karoonga. vaastav mein, jo abhimaan (ahankaar) karenge meree ibaadat (vandana-praarthana) se, to ve pravesh karenge narak mein apamaanit hokar
allaah hee ne tumhaare lie raatri banaee, taaki tum vishraam karo usamen tatha din ko prakaashamaan banaaya.[1] vastutah, allaah bada upakaaree hai logon ke lie. kintu, adhiktar log krtagy nahin hote
yahee allaah tumhaara paalanahaar hai, pratyek vastu ka rachayita, utpattikaar. nahin hai koee ( sachcha) vandaneey usake siva, phir tum kahaan bahake jaate ho
isee prakaar, bahaka diye jaate hain ve, jo allaah kee aayaton ko nakaarate hain

allaah hee hai, jisane banaaya tumhaare lie dharatee ko nivaas sthaan tatha aakaash ko chhat aur tumhaara roop banaaya, to sundar roop banaaya tatha tumhen jeevika pradaan kee svchh cheezon se. vahee allaah tumhaara paalanahaar hai, to shubh hai allaah, sarvalok ka paalanahaar
vah jeevit hai, koee ( sachcha) vandaneey nahin hai, usake siva. atah, vishesh roop se usakee ibaadat karate hue usee ko pukaaro. sab prashansa sarvalok ke paalanahaar, allaah ke lie hain

aap kah den: nishchay mujhe rok diya gaya hai ki ibaadat karoon unakee, jinhen tum pukaarate ho allaah ke siva, jab aa gaye mere paas khule pramaan tatha mujhe aadesh diya gaya hai ki main sarvalok ke paalanahaar ka aagyaakaaree rahoon

vahee hai, jisane tumhen paida kiya mittee se, phir veery se, phir bandhe rakt se, phir tumhen nikaalata hai (garbhaashayon se) shishu banaakar. phir bada karata hai, taaki tum apanee pooree shakti ko pahuncho. phir boodhe ho jao tatha tumamen kuchh isase pahale hee mar jaate hain aur ye isalie hota hai, taaki tum apanee nishchit aayu ko pahunch jao tatha taaki tum samajho
vahee hai, jo tumhen jeevan deta tatha maarata hai, phir jab vah kisee kaary ka nirnay karata hai, to kahata haih "ho ja", to vah ho jaata hai
kya aapane nahin dekha ki jo jhagadate[1] hain allaah kee aayaton mein, ve kahaan bahakaaye ja rahe hain
jinhonne jhuthala diya pustak ko aur use, jisake saath hamane bheja apane rasoolon ko, to sheeghr hee ve jaan lenge
jab tauq honge unake galon mein tatha bediyaan, ve kheenche jaayenge
khaulate paanee mein, phir agni mein jhonk diye jaayenge
phir kaha jaayega unaseh kahaan hain ve, jinhen tum saajhee bana rahe the
allaah ke siva? ve kahenge ki ve kho gaye ham se, balki, ham nahin pukaarate the isase poorv, kisee cheez ko. isee prakaar, allaah kupath kar deta hai kaafiron ko
ye yaatana isalie hai ki tum dharatee mein avaidh itaraate the tatha is kaaran ki tum akadate the
pravesh kar jao narak ke dvaaron mein, sadaavaasee hokar usamen. to bura sthaan hai abhimaaniyon ka

to aap dhairy rakhen nishchay allaah ka vachan saty hai. phir yadi aapako dikha den us (yaatana) mein se, jisaka vachan unhen de rahe hain ya aapaka nidhan kar den, to vah hamaaree or hee phere jaayenge

tatha (he nabee!) ham bhej chuke hain bahut-se rasoolon ko aapase poorv, jinamen se kuchh ka varnan ham aapase kar chuke hain tatha kuchh ka varnan aapase nahin kiya hai tatha kisee rasool ke (vash)[1] mein ye nahin tha ki vah koee aayat (chamatkaar) le aaye, parantu allaah kee anumati se. phir jab aa jaayega allaah ka aadesh, to nirnay kar diya jaayega saty ke saath aur kshati mein pad jaayenge vahaan, kshoothe log
allaah hee hai, jisane banaaye tumhaare lie chaupaaye, taaki savaaree karo kuchh par aur kuchh ko khao
tatha tumhaare lie unamen bahut laabh hain aur taaki tum unapar pahuncho, us aavashyakta ko, jo tumhaare[1] dilon mein hai tatha unapar aur naavon par tumhen savaar kiya jaata hai
tatha vah dikhaata hai tumhen apanee nishaaniyaan. to tum allaah kee kin-kin nishaaniyon ka inkaar karoge

to kya vah chale-phire nahin dharatee mein, taaki dekhate ki kaisa raha unaka parinaam, jo unase poorv the? ve unase adhik kade the, shakti mein aur dharatee mein adhik chinh[1] chhod gaye. to nahin aaya unake kaam, jo ve kar rahe the
jab aaye unake paas hamaare rasool, nishaaniyaan lekar, to ve itaraane lage us gyaan par,[1] jo unake paas tha aur gher liya unhen usane jisaka ve upahaas kar rahe the
to jab unhonne dekha hamaaree yaatana ko, to kahane lageh ham eemaan laaye akele allaah par tatha nakaar diya use, jise usaka saajhee bana rahe the

to aisa nahin hua ki unhen laabh pahunchaata unaka eemaan, jab unhonne dekh liya hamaaree yaatana ko. yahee allaah ka niyam hai, jo usake bhakton mein chala aa raha hai aur kshati mein pad gaye yaheen kaafir
haaa, meem
avatarit hai atyant krpaasheel, dayaavaan kee or se
(ye aisee) pustak hai, savistaar varnit kee gaee hain jisakee aayaten. quraan arabee (bhaasha mein) hai unake lie, jo gyaan rakhate hon
vah shubh soochana dene tatha sachet karane vaala hai phir bhee munh pher liya hai unamen se adhiktar ne aur sun nahin rahe hain

tatha unhonne kahaah[1] hamaare dil aavaran (parde) mein hain usase, aap hamen jisakee or bula rahe hain tatha hamaare kaanon mein bojh hai tatha hamaare aur aapake beech ek aad hai. to aap apana kaam karen aur ham apana kaam kar rahe hain

aap kah den ki main to ek manushy hoon tumhaare jaisa. meree or vahyee kee ja rahee hai ki tumhaara vandaneey (poojy) keval ek hee hai. atah, seedhe ho jao usee kee or tatha kshama maango usase aur vinaash hai mushrikon ke lie
jo zakaat nahin dete tatha aakhirat ko (bhee) nahin maanate
nihsandeh, jo eemaan laaye tatha sadaachaar kiye, unheen ke lie anant pratiphal hai
aap kahen ki kya tum use nakaarate ho, jisane paida kiya dharatee ko do din mein aur banaate ho usake saajhee? vahee hai, sarvalok ka paralanahaar

tatha banaaye us (dharatee) mein parvat usake oopar tatha barakat rakh dee usamen aur ankan kiya usamen usake vaasiyon ke aahaaron ka chaar[1] dinon mein samaan roop[2] se, prashn karane vaalon ke lie
phir aakarshit hua aakaash kee or tatha vah dhuaan tha. to use tatha dharatee ko aadesh diya ki tum donon aa jao prasann hokar athava dabaav se. to donon ne kahaah ham prasann hokar aa gaye

tatha bana diya unako saat aakaash, do dinon mein, vahyee kar diya pratyek aakaash mein usaka aadesh tatha hamane susajjit kiya sameep (sansaar) ke aakaash ko, deepon (taaron) se tatha suraksha ke[1] lie. ye ati prabhaalashaalee sarvagy kee yojana hai
phir bhee yadi vah vimukh hon, to aap kah den ki mainne tumhen saavadhaan kar diya kadee yaatana se, jo aad tatha samood kee kadee yaatana jaisee hogee

jab aaye unake paas, unake rasool, unake aage tatha unake peechhe[1] se ki na ibaadat (vandana) karo allaah ke siva kee. to unhonne kahaah yadi hamaara paalanahaar chaahata, to kisee farishte ko utaar deta.[2] atah, tum jis baat ke saath bheje gaye ho, ham use nahin maanate

rahe aad, to unhonne abhimaan kiya dharatee mein avaidh tatha kaha ki kaun hamase adhik hai bal mein? kya unhonne nahin dekha ki allaah, jisane unako paida kiya unase adhik hai bal mein tatha hamaaree aayaton ko nakaarate rahe

antatah, hamane bhej dee unapar prachand vaayu, kuchh ashubh dinon mein. taaki chakhaayen unhen apamaanakaaree yaatana saansaarik jeevan mein aur aakhirat (pralok) kee yaatana adhik apamaanakaaree hai tatha unhen koee sahaayata nahin dee jaayegee

aur rahe samood, to hamane unhen maarg dikhaaya, phir bhee unhonne andhe bane rahane ko maargadarshan se priy samajha. antatah, pakad liya unhen apamaanakaaree yaatana kee kadak ne, usake kaaran jo ve kar rahe the
tatha hamane bacha liya unhen, jo eemaan laaye tatha (avagya se) darate rahe
aur jis din allaah ke shatru ekatr kiye jaayenge, to ve rok lie jaayenge
yahaantak ki jab aa jaayenge us (narak) ke paas, to saakshy denge unapar unake kaan tatha unakee aankhen aur unakee khaalen us karm ka, jo ve kiya karate the

aur ve kahenge apanee khaalon seh kyon saakshy diya tumane hamaare virudhd? ve uttar dengee ki hamen bolane kee shakti pradaan kee hai usane, jisane pratyek vastu ko bolane kee shakti dee hai tatha useene tumhen paida kiya pratham baar aur usee kee or tumasab phere ja rahe ho

tatha tum (paap karate samay)[1] chhupaate nahin the ki kaheen saakshy na den, tumapar, tumhaare kaan, tumhaaree aankh evan tumhaaree khaalen. parantu, tum samajhate rahe ki allaah nahin jaanata usamen se adhiktar baaton ko, jo tum karate ho
isee kuvichaar ne, jo tumane kiya apane paalanahaar ke vishay mein, tumhen naash kar diya aur tum vinaashon mein ho gaye
to yadi ve dhairy rakhen, tababhee narak hee unaka aavaas hai aur yadi ve kshama maangen, tababhee ve kshama nahin kiye jaayenge

aur hamane bana diye unake lie aise saathee, jo shobhaneey bana rahe the unake lie, unake agale tatha pichhale dushkarmon ko tatha sidhd ho gaya unapar, allaah (kee yaatana) ka vachan, un samudaayon mein, jo guzar gaye inase poorv, jinnon tatha manushyon mein se. vaastav mein, vahee kshatigrast the
tatha kaafiron ne kaha[1] ki is quraan ko na suno aur kolaahal (shor) karo is (ke sunaane) ke samay. sambhavatah, tum prabhutvashaalee ho jao
to ham avashy chakhaayenge unhen, jo kaafir ho gaye, kadee yaatana aur avashy unhen kufal denge, us dushkarm ka, jo ve karate rahe
ye allaah ke shatruon ka pratikaar narak hai. unake lie usamen sthaayee ghar honge, usake badale, jo hamaaree ayaton ko nakaar rahe hain

tatha vo kahenge jo kaafir ho gaye ki hamaare paalanahar! hamen dikha de unhen, jinhon ne hamen kupath kiya hai, jinnon tatha manushyon mein se. taakee ham raund den un donon ko, apane pairon se. taaki ve donon adhik neeche ho jaayen

nishchay jinhonne kaha ki hamaara paalanahaar allaah hai, phir iseepar sthir rah[1] gaye, to unapar farishte utarate hain[2] ki bhay na karo aur na udaaseen raho tatha us svarg se prasann ho jao, jisaka vachan tumhen diya ja raha hai

ham tumhaare sahaayak hain, saansaarik jeevan mein tatha paralok mein aur tumhaare lie us (svarg) mein vah cheez hai, jo tumhaara man chaahe tatha usamen tumhaare lie vah hai, jisakee tum maang karoge
atithi-satkaar svaroop, ati kshamee, dayaavaan kee or se
aur kisakee baat usase achchhee hogee, jo allaah kee or bulaaye tatha sadaachaar kare aur kahe ki main musalamaanon mein se hoon
aur samaan nahin hote puny tatha paap, aap door karen (buraee ko) usake dvaara, jo sarvottam ho. to sahasa aapake tatha jisake beech bair ho, maano vah haardik mitr ho gaya
aur ye gun unheen ko praapt hota hai, jo sahan karen tatha unheen ko hota hai, jo bade bhaagyashaalee hon
aur yadi aapako shaitaan kee or se koee sanshay ho, to allaah kee sharan len. vaastav mein, vahee sab kuchh sunane-jaanane vaala hai

tatha usakee nishaaniyon mein se hai raatri, divas, soory tatha chandrama, tum sajda na karo soory tatha chandrama ko aur sajda karo us allaah ko, jisane paida kiya hai unako, yadi tum usee (allaah) kee ibaadat (vandana) karate ho
tatha yadi ve abhimaan karen, to jo (farishte) aapake paalanahaar ke paas hain, ve usakee pavitrata ka varnan karate rahate hain, raatri tatha divas mein aur ve thakate nahin hain

tatha usee kee nishaaniyon mein se hai ki aap dekhate hain dharatee ko sahamee huee. phir jaise hee hamane usapar jal barasaaya, to vah lahalahaane lagee tatha ubhar gayee. nishchay jisane jeevit kiya hai use, avashy vahee jeevit karane vaala hai murdon ko. vaastav mein, vah jo chaahe, kar sakata hai

jo tedh nikaalate hain hamaaree aayaton mein, ve hamapar chhupe nahin rahate. to kya jo phenk diya jaayega agni mein, uttam hai athava jo nirbhay hokar aayega pralay ke din? karo jo chaaho, vaastav mein, vah jo tum karate ho, use dekh raha hai
nishchay unhonne kufr kar diya is shiksha (quraan) ke saath, jab aa gayee unake paas aur sach ye hai ki ye ek ati sammaanit pustak hai
nahin aa sakata jhuth isake aage se aur na isake peechhe se. utara hai tatvagy, prashansit (allaah) kee or se
aapase vahee kaha ja raha hai, jo aapase poorv rasoolon se kaha gaya.[1] vaastav mein, aapaka paalanahaar kshama karane (tatha) duhkhadaayee yaatana dene vaala hai

aur yadi ham ise banaate arabee (ke atirikt kisee) any bhaasha mein, to ve avashy kahate ki kyon nahin khol dee gayeen usakee aayaten? ye kya ki (pustak) gair arabee aur (nabee) arabee? aap kah den ki vah unake lie, jo eemaan laaye, maargadarshan tatha aarogyakar hai aur jo eemaan na laayen, unake kaanon mein bojh hai aur vah unapar andhaapan hai aur vahee pukaare ja rahe hain door sthaanon se

tatha ham pradaan kar chuke hain moosa ko pustak (tauraat). to usamen bhee vibhed kiya gaya aur yadi ek baat pahale hee se nirdhaarit na hotee[1] aapake paalanahaar kee or se, to nirnay kar diya jaata unake beech. nihsandeh, vah unake vishay mein sandeh mein daanvaadol hain
jo sadaachaar karega, to vah apane hee laabh ke lie karega aur jo duraachaar karega, to usaka dushparinaam useepar hoga aur aapaka paalanahaar tanik bhee atyaachaar karane vaala nahin hai bhakton par

usee kee or phera jaata hai pralay ka gyaan tatha nahin nikalate koee phal apane gaabhon se aur nahin garbh dhaaran karatee koee maada aur na janm detee hai, parantu usake gyaan se aur jis din vah pookaarega unhen ki kahaan hain mere saajhee? to ve kahenge ki hamane tujhe bata diya tha ki hamamen se koee usaka gavaah nahin hai
aur kho jaayenge[1] unase ve, jinhen pukaarate the isase poorv tatha ve vishvaas kar lenge ki nahin hai unake lie koee sharan ka sthaan
nahin thakata manushy bhalaee (sukh) kee praarthana se aur yadi use pahunch jaaye buraee (duhkh), to (hataash) niraash[1] ho jaata hai

aur yadi ham use[1] chakha den apanee daya, duhkh ke pashchaat, jo use pahuncha ho, to avashy kah deta hai ki main to isake yogy hee tha aur main nahin samajhata ki pralay honee hai aur yadi main punah apane paalanahaar kee or gaya, to nishchay hee mere lie usake paas bhalaee hogee. to ham avashy avagat kar denge kaafiron ko unake karmon se tatha unhen avashy ghor yaatana chakhaayenge
tatha jab ham upakaar karate hain manushy par, to vah vimukh ho jaata hai tatha akad jaata hai aur jab use duhkh pahunche, to lambee-chaudee praarthana karane lagata hai
aap kah den: bhala tum ye to batao, yadi ye quraan allaah kee or se ho, fir tum kufr kar jao usake saath, to kaun usase adhik kupath hoga, jo usake virodh mein door tak chala jaaye

ham sheeghr hee dikha denge unhen apanee nishaaniyaan sansaar ke kinaaron mein tatha svayan unake bheetar. yahaantak ki khul jaayegee unake lie ye baat ki yahee sach hai[1] aur kya ye baat prayaapt nahin ki aapaka paalanahaar hee pratyek vastu ka saakshee (gavaah) hai
saavadhaan! vahee sandeh mein hain, apane paalanahaar se milane ke vishay mein. saavadhaan! vahee (allaah), pratyek vastu ko ghere hue hai
haaa meem
ain seen qaaf
isee prakaar, (allaah) ne prakaashana[1] bhejee hai aap tatha un rasoolon kee or, jo aapase poorv hue hain. allaah sabase prabal aur sab gunon ko jaanane vaala hai
usee ka hai, jo aakaashon tatha dharatee mein hai aur vah bada uchch, mahaan hai

sameep hai ki aakaash phat[1] paden apane oopar se, jabaki farishte pavitrata ka gaan karate hain apane paalanahaar kee prashansa ke saath tatha kshamaayaachana karate hain unake lie, jo dharatee mein hain. suno! vaastav mein, allaah hee atyant kshama karane tatha daya karane vaala hai
tatha jin logon ne bana lie hain allaah ke siva sanrakshak, allaah hee unapar nireekshak (nigaraan) hai aur aap unake uttar daayee[1] nahin hain

tatha isee prakaar, hamane vahyee (prakaashana) kee hai aapakee or arabee quraan kee. taaki aap saavadhaan kar den makka[1] vaasiyon ko aur jo usake aas-paas hain tatha saavadhaan kar den ekatr hone ke din[2] se, jis din ke hone mein koee sanshay nahin. ek paksh svarg mein tatha ek paksh narak mein hoga
aur yadi allaah chaahata, to sabhee ko ek samudaay[1] bana deta. parantu, vah pravesh karaata hai jise chaahe, apanee daya mein tatha atyaachaariyon ka koee sanrakshak tatha sahaayak na hoga
kya unhonne bana lie hain usake siva sanrakshak? to allaah hee sanrakshak hai aur jeevit karega murdon ko aur vahee jo chaahe, kar sakata hai
aur jis baat mein bhee tumane vibhed kiya hai, usaka nirnay allaah hee ko karana hai.[1] vahee allaah mera paalanahaar hai, useepar mainne bharosa kiya hai tatha usee kee or dhyaanamagn hota hoon

vah aakaashon tatha dharatee ka rachayita hai. usane banaaye hain tumhaaree jaati mein se tumhaare jode tatha pashuon ke jode. vah phaila raha hai tumhen is prakaar. usakee koee pratima[1] nahin aur vah sab kuchh sunane-jaanane vaala hai
usee ke[1] adhikaar mein hain aakaashon tatha dharatee kee kunjiyaan. vah phaila deta hai jeevika, jisake lie chaahe tatha naap kar deta hai. vaastav mein, vahee pratyek vastu ka jaanane vaala hai

usane niyat[1] kiya hai tumhaare lie vahee dharm, jisaka aadesh diya tha nooh ko aur jise vahyee kiya hai aapakee or tatha jisaka aadesh diya tha ibraaheem tatha moosa aur eesa ko ki is dharm kee sthaapana karo aur isamen bhed bhaav na karo. yahee baat apriy lagee hai mushrikon ko, jisakee or aap bula rahe hain. allaah hee chunata hai isake lie jise chaahe aur seedhee raah usee ko dikhaata hai, jo usee kee or dhyaanamagn ho

aur unhonne[1] isake pashchaat hee vibhed kiya, jab unake paas gyaan aa gaya, aapas ke virodh ke kaaran tatha yadi ek baat pahale se nishchit[2] na hotee aapake paalanahaar kee or se, to avashy nirnay kar diya gaya hota unake beech aur jo pustak ke uttaraadhikaaree banaaye[3] gaye unake pashchaat, usakee or se sandeh mein ulajhe hue hain

to aap logon ko isee dharm kee or bulaate rahen tatha jaise aapako aadesh diya gaya hai usapar sthit rahen aur unakee ichchhaon par na chalen tatha kah den ki main eemaan laaya un sabhee pustakon par, jo allaah ne utaaree[1] hain tatha moojhe aadesh diya gaya hai ki tumhaare beech nyaay karoon. allaah hamaara tatha tumhaara paalanahaar hai. hamaare lie hamaare karm hain tatha tumhaare lie tumhaare karm. hamaare aur tumhaare beech koee jhagada nahin. allaah hee hamen ekatr karega tatha usee kee or sab ko jaana hai

tatha jo log jhagadate hain allaah (ke dharm ke baare) mein, jabaki use[1] maan liya gaya hai. unaka vivaad (kutark) asaty hai allaah ke sameep tatha unheen par krodh hai aur unheen ke lie kadee yaatana hai
allaah hee ne utaaree hain sab pustaken saty ke saath tatha taraajoo[1] ko aur aapako kya pata shaayad pralay ka samay sameep ho

sheeghr maang kar rahe hain us (pralay) kee, jo eemaan nahin rakhate usapar aur jo eemaan laaye hain, ve usase dar rahe hain tatha vishvaas rakhate hain ki vah sach hai. suno! nishchay jo vivaad kar rahe hain, pralay ke vishay mein, ve kupath mein bahut door chale gaye hain
allaah bada dayaalu hai apane bhakton par. vah jeevika pradaan karata hai, jise chaahe tatha vah bada prabal, prabhaavashaalee hai

jo aakhirat (paralok) kee khetee[1] chaahata ho, to ham usake lie usakee khetee badha dete hain aur jo sansaar kee khetee chaahata ho, to ham use usamen se kuchh de dete hain aur usake lie paralok mein koee bhaag nahin

kya in (mushrikon) ke kuchh aise saajhee[1] hain, jinhonne unake lie koee aisa dhaarmik niyam bana diya hai, jisakee anumati allaah ne nahin dee hai? aur yadi nirnay kee baat nishchit na hotee, to (abhee) inake beech nirnay kar diya jaata tatha nishchay atyaachaariyon ke lie hee duhkhadaayee yaatana hai

tum atyaachaariyon ko darate hue dekhogo un dushkarmon ke kaaran, jo unhonne kiye hain aur vah unapar aakar rahega tatha jo eemaan laaye aur sadaachaar kiye, ve svarg ke baagon mein honge. ve jisakee ichchha karenge unake paalanahaar ke yahaan milega. ye badee daya hai

ye vah (daya) hai, jisakee shubh soochana deta hai allaah apane bhakton ko, jo eemaan laaye tatha sadaachaar kiye. aap kah den ki main nahin maangata hoon isapar tumase koee badala, us prem ke siva, jo sambandhiyon[1] mein (hota) hai

kya ve kahate hain ki usane allaah par jhooth ghad liya hai? to yadi allaah chaahe, to aapake dil par muhar laga de.[1] aur allaah mita deta hai jhooth ko aur sach ko apane aadeshon dvaara sach kar dikhaata hai. vah seenon (dilon) ke bhedon ka jaanane vaala hai
vahee hai, jo sveekaar karata hai apane bhakton kee tauba tatha kshama karata hai doshon[1] ko aur jaanata hai, jo kuchh tum karate ho
aur unakee praarthana sveekaar karata hai, jo eemaan laaye aur sadaachaar kiye tatha unhen adhik pradaan karata hai apanee daya se aur kaafiron hee ke lie kadee yaatana hai

aur yadi phaila deta allaah jeevika apane bhakton ke lie, to ve vidroh[1] kar dete dharatee mein. parantu, vah utaarata hai ek anumaan se jaise vah chaahata hai. vaastav mein, vah apane bhakton se bhalee-bhaanti soochit hai. (tatha) unhen dekh raha hai
tatha vahee hai, jo varsha karata hai isake pashchaat ki log niraash ho jaayen tatha phaila[1] deta hai apanee daya aur vahee sanrakshak, saraahaneey hai
tatha usakee nishaaniyon mein se hai, aakaashon aur dharatee kee utpatti tatha jo phailaayen hain un donon mein jeev aur vah unhen ekatr karane par jab chaahe,[1] saamarthy rakhane vaala hai
aur jo bhee duhkh tumhen pahunchata hai, vah tumhaare apane karatoot se pahuchata hai tatha vah kshama kar deta hai tumhaare bahut-se paapon ko
aur tum vivash karane vaale nahin ho dharatee mein aur na tumhaara allaah ke siva koee sanrakshak aur na sahaayak hai
tatha usake (saamarthy) kee nishaaniyon mein se hain chalatee huee naav saagaron mein, parvaton ke samaan
yadi vah chaahe, to rok de vaayu ko aur vah khadee rah jaayen usake oopar. nishchay isamen badee nishaaniyaan hain pratyek bade dhairyavaan[1] krtagy ke lie
athava vinaash[1] kar de un (naavon) ka, unake karatooton ke badale aur vah kshama karata hai bahut kuchh
tatha vah jaanata hai unhen, jo jhagadate hain hamaaree aayaton mein. unheen ke lie koee bhaagane ka sthaan nahin hai

tumhen jo kuchh diya gaya hai, vah saansaarik jeevan ka sansaadhan hai tatha jo kuchh allaah ke paas hai, vah uttam aur sthaayee[1] hai unake lie, jo allaah par eemaan laaye tatha apane paalanahaar hee par bharosa rakhate hain
tatha jo bachate hain bade paapon tatha nirlajja ke karmon se aur jab krodh aa jaaye to kshama kar dete hain

tatha jinhonne apane paalanahaar ke aadesh ko maan liya, sthaapana kee namaaz kee aur unake pratyek kaary aapas ke vichaar-vimarsh se hote hain[1] aur jo kuchh hamane unhen pradaan kiya hai usamen se daan karate hain
aur yadi unapar atyaachaar kiya jaaye, to ve baraabaree ka badala lete hain

aur buraee ka pratikaar (badala) buraee hai, usee jaisee.[1] phir jo kshama kar de tatha sudhaar karale, to usaka pratiphal allaah ke oopar hai. vaastav mein, vah prem nahin karata hai atyaachaariyon se
tatha jo badala len apane oopar atyaachaar hone ke pashchaat, to unapar koee dosh nahin hai
dosh keval unapar hai, jo logon par atyaachaar karate hain aur naahqa zameen mein upadrav karate hain. unheen ke lie dardanaak yaatana hai
aur jo sahan kare tatha kshama kar de, to ye nishchay bade saahas[1] ka kaary hai
tatha jise allaah kupath kar de, to usaka koee rakshak nahin hai, usake pashchaat tatha aap dekhenge atyaachaariyon ko jab ve dekhenge yaatana ko, ve kah rahe hongeh kya vaapasee kee koee raah hai

tatha aap unhen dekhenge ki ve prastut kiye ja rahe hain narak par, sir jhukaaye, apamaan ke kaaran. ve dekh rahe honge kankhiyon se tatha kahenge jo eemaan laaye ki vaastav mein ghaate mein vahee hain, jinhonne ghaate mein daal diya svayan ko tatha apane parivaar ko, pralay ke din. suno! atyaachaaree hee sthaayee yaatana mein honge
tatha nahin honge unake koee sahaayak, jo allaah ke muqaabale mein unakee sahaayata karen aur jise kupath kar de allaah, to usake lie koee maarg nahin

maan lo apane paalanahaar kee baat, isase poorv ki aa jaaye vah din, jise talana nahin hai allaah kee or se. nahin hoga tumhaare lie koee sharan ka sthaan, us din aur na chhipakar anajaan ban jaane ka

phir bhee yadi ve vimukh hon, to (he nabee!) hamane nahin bheja hai aapako unapar rakshak banaakar. aapaka daayitv keval sandesh pahuncha dena hai aur vaastav mein, jab ham chakha dete hain manushy ko apanee daya, to vah itaraane lagata hai, usapar aur yadi pahunchata hai unhen koee duhkh, unake karatoot ke kaaran, to manushy bada krtaghn ban jaata hai
allaah hee ka hai aakaashon tatha dharatee ka raajy. vah paida karata hai, jo chaahata hai. jise chaahe, putriyaan pradaan karata hai tatha jise chaahe, putr pradaan karata hai
athava unhen putr aur[1] putriyaan milaakar deta hai aur jise chaahe, baanjh bana deta hai. vaastav mein, vah sab kuchh jaanane vaala (tatha) saamarthy rakhane vaala hai

aur nahin sambhav hai kisee manushy ke lie ki baat kare allaah usase, parantu vahyee[1] dvaara, athava parde ke peechhe se athava bhej de koee rasool (farishta), jo vahyee kare usakee anumati se, jo kuchh vah chaahata ho. vaastav mein, vah sabase ooncha (tatha) sabhee gun jaanane vaala hai

aur isee prakaar, hamane vahyee (prakaashana) kee hai, aapakee or, apane aadesh kee rooh (quraan). aap nahin jaanate the ki pustak kya hai aur eemaan[1] kya hai. parantu, hamane ise bana diya ek jyoti. ham maarg dikhaate hain isake dvaara, jise chaahate hain apane bhakton mein se aur vastutah, aap seedhee raah[1] dikha rahe hain
allaah kee raah, jisake adhikaar mein hai, jo kuchh aakaashon mein tatha jo kuchh dharatee mein hai. saavadhaan! allaah hee kee or phirate hain, sabhee kaary
haaa meem
shapath hai pratyaksh (khulee) pustak kee
ise hamane banaaya hai arabee quraan, taaki ve ise samajh saken
tatha vah mool pustak[1] mein hai, hamaare paas, bada uchch tatha gyaan se paripoorn hai
to kya ham pher den, is shiksha ko, tumase, isalie ki tum ullanghanakaaree log ho
tatha hamane bheje hain bahut-se nabee (guzaree huyee) jaatiyon mein
aur nahin aata raha unake paas koee nabee, parantu ve usake saath upahaas karate rahe
to hamane vinaash kar diya inase[1] adhik shaktivaanon ka tatha guzar chuka hai agalon ka udaaharan
aur yadi aap prashn karen unase ki kisane paida kiya hai aakaashon tatha dharatee ko? to avashy kahengeh unhen paida kiya hai bade prabhaavashaalee, sab kuchh jaanane vaale ne
jisane banaaya tumahaare lie dharatee ko paalana aur banaaye usamen tumhaare lie maarg, taaki tum maarg pa sako
tatha jisane utaara aakaash se jal, ek vishesh maatra mein. phir jeevit kar diya usake davaara murda bhoomi ko. isee prakaar, tum (dharatee se) nikaale jaoge
tatha jisane paida kiye sab prakaar ke jode tatha banaeen tumhaare lie naukaayen tatha pashu jinapar tum savaar hote ho

taaki tum savaar ho unake oopar, phir yaad karo apane paalanahaar ke pradaan ko, jab savaar ho jao usapar aur ye[1] kahoh pavitr hai vah, jisane vash mein kar diya hamaare lie ise. anyatha ham ise vash mein nahin kar sakate the
tatha ham avashy hee apane paalanahaar hee kee or phirakar jaane vaale hain
aur bana liya unhonne[1] usake bhakton mein se kuchh ko usaka ansh. vaastav mein, manushy khula krtaghn hai
kya allaah ne usamen se, jo paida karata hai, putriyaan bana lee hain tatha tumhen vishesh kar diya hai putron ke saath
jabaki unamen se kisee ko shubh soochana dee jaaye us (ke janm lene) kee, jisaka usane udaaharan diya hai atyant krpaasheel ke lie, to usaka mukh kaala[1] ho jaata hai aur shok se bhar jaata hai
kya (allaah ke lie) vah hai, jisaka paalanaposhan aabhooshan mein kiya jaata hai tatha vah vivaad mein khulakar baat nahin kar sakatee
aur unhonne bana diya farishton ko, jo atyant krpaasheel ke bhakt hain, putriyaan. kya ve upasthit the unakee utpatti ke samay? likh lee jaayegee unakee gavaahee aur unase poochh hogee
tatha unhonne kaha ki yadi atyant krpaasheel chaahata, to ham unakee ibaadat nahin karate. unhen isaka koee gyaan nahin. vah keval teer-tukke chala rahe hain
kya hamane unhen pradaan kee hai koee pustak isase pahale, jise ve drdhata se pakade hue hain
balki, ye kahate hain ki hamane paaya hai apane poorvajon ko ek reeti par aur ham unheen ke padchinhon par chal rahe hain

tatha (he nabee!) isee prakaar, hamane nahin bhejee aapase poorv kisee bastee mein koee saavadhaan karane vaala, parantu kaha usake sukhee logon neh hamane paaya hai apane poorvajon ko ek reeti par aur ham nishchay unheen ke padchinhon par chal rahe hain

nabee ne kahaah kya (tum unheen ka anugaman karoge) yadpi main laaya hoon tumhaare paas usase adhik seedha maarg, jisapar tumane paaya hai apane poorvajon ko? to unhonne kahaah ham, jis (dharm) ke saath tum bheje gaye ho, use maanane vaale nahin hai
antatah, hamane badala chuka liya unase. to dekho ki kaisa raha jhuthalaane vaalon ka dushparinaam
tatha yaad karo, jab kaha ibraaheem ne apane pita tatha apanee jaati seh nishchay main virakt hoon usase, jisakee vandana tum karate ho
usake atirikt, jisane mujhe paida kiya hai. vahee mujhe raah dikhaayega
tatha chhod gaya vah is baat (ekeshvaravaad) ko[1] apanee santaan mein, taaki ve shirk se bachate rahen
balki, mainne inhen tatha inake baap-daada ko jeevan ka saamaan diya. yahaan tak ki aa gaya unake paas saty (quraan) aur ek khula rasool
tatha jab aa gaya unake paas saty, to unhonne kah diya ki ye jaadoo hai tatha ham, ise maanane vaale nahin hain
tatha unhonne kaha ki kyon nahin utaara[1] gaya ye quraan, do bastiyon mein se kisee bade vyakti par

kaya vahee baantate[1] hain aapake paalanahaar kee daya? hamane baantee hai, unake beech, unakee jeevika saansaarik jeevan mein tatha hamane uchch kiya hai, unamen se ek ko doosare par, kaee shreniyaan. taaki ek-doosare se seva kaary len tatha aapake paalanahaar kee daya[1] usase uttam hai, jise ve ikattha kar rahe hain

aur yadi ye baat na hotee ki sabhee log ek hee neeti par ho jaate, to ham avashy bana dete unake lie, jo kuphr karate hain atyant krpaasheel ke saath, unake gharon kee chhaten chaandee kee tatha seedhiyaan jinapar ve chadhate hain
tatha unake gharon ke dvaar aur takht jinapar ve takiye lagaaye[1] rahate hain
tatha bana dete shobha. nahin hain ye sab kuchh, parantu saansaarik jeevan ke saamaan tatha aakhirat[1] (paralok) aapake paalanahaar ke yahaan keval aagyaakaariyon ke lie hai
aur jo vyakti atyant krpaasheel (allaah) ke smaran se andha ho jaata hai, to ham usapar ek shaitaan niyukt kar dete hain, jo usaka saathee ho jaata hai
aur ve (shaitaan) unhen rokate hain seedhee raah se tatha ve samajhate hain ki ve seedhee raah par hain
yahaan tak ki jab vah hamaare paas aayega, to ye kaamana karega ki mere tatha tere (shaitaan ke) beech pashchim tatha poorv kee dooree hotee. too bura saathee hai
(unase kaha jaayegaah) aur tumhen kadaapi koee laabh nahin hoga aaj, jabaki tumane atyaachaar kar liya hai. vaastav mein, tum sab yaatana mein saajhee rahoge
to (he nabee!) kya aap suna lenge baharon ko ya seedhee raah dikha denge andhon ko tatha unhen, jo khule kupath[1] mein hon
phir yadi ham aapako (sansaar se) le jaayen, to bhee ham unase badala lene vaale hain
athava aapako dikha den, jis (yaatana) ka hamane unako vachan diya hai, to nishchay ham unapar saamarthy rakhane vaale hain
to (he nabee!) aap drdhata se pakade rahen use, jo ham aapakee or vahyee kar rahe hain. vaastav mein, aap seedhee raah par hain
nishchay ye quraan, aapake lie tatha aapakee jaati ke lie ek shiksha[1] hai aur jald hee tumase prashn[2] kiya jaayega
tatha he nabee! aap poochh len unase jinhen hamane bheja hai, aapase pahale, apane rasoolon mein se ki kya hamane banaaye hain atyant krpaasheel ke atirikt vandaneey, jinakee vandana kee jaaye
tatha hamane bheja moosa ko apanee nishaaniyon ke saath firaun aur usake pramukhon kee or. to usane kahaah vaastav mein, main sarvalok ke paalanahaar ka rasool hoon
aur jab vah unake paas laaya hamaaree nishaaniyaan, to sahasa ve unakee hansee udaane lage
tatha ham unhen ek se badh kar ek nishaanee dikhaate rahe aur hamane pakad liya unhen yaatana mein, taaki ve (thattha) se ruk jaayen
aur unhonne kahaah he jaadoogar! praarthana kar hamaare lie apane paalanahaar se, us vachan ke aadhaar par, jo tujhase kiya hai. vaastav mein, ham seedhee raah par aa jaayenge
to jaise hee hamane door kee unase yaatana, to ve sahasa vachan todane lage
tatha pukaara firaun ne apanee jaati mein. usane kahaah he meree jaati! kya nahin hai mere lie misr ka raajy tatha ye naharen, jo bah rahee hain mere neeche se? to kya tum dekh nahin rahe ho
main achchha hoon ya vah jo apamaanit (heen) hai aur khulakar bol bhee nahin sakata
kyon nahin utaare gaye usapar sone ke kangan athava aaye farishte usake saath pankti baandhe hue
to usane jhaansa de diya apanee jaati ko aur sabane usakee baat maan lee. vaastav mein, ve the hee avagyaakaaree log
phir jab unhonne hamen krodhit kar diya, to hamane unase badala le liya aur sabako dubo diya
aur bana diya hamane unako gaya-guzara aur ek udaaharan, pashchaat ke logon ke lie
tatha jab diya gaya maryam ke putr ka[1] udaaharan, to sahasa aapakee jaati usase prasann hokar shor machaane lagee
tatha mushrikon ne kaha ki hamaare devata achchhe hain ya ve? unhonne nahin diya ye (udaaharan) aapako, parantu kutark (jhagadane) ke lie. balki, ve hain hee bade jhagadaaloo log
nahin hai vah[1] (eesa), parantu ek bhakt (daas) jisapar hamane upakaar kiya tatha use israeel kee santaan ke lie ek aadarsh banaaya
aur yadi ham chaahate, to bana dete tumhaare badale farishte dharatee mein, jo ek-doosare ka sthaan lete
tatha vaastav mein, vah (eesa) ek bada lakshan[1] hain pralay ka. atah, kadaapi sandeh na karo pralay ke vishay mein aur meree hee baat maano. yahee seedhee raah hai
tatha tumhen kadaapi na rok de shaitaan. nishchay vah tumhaara khula shatru hai

aur jab aa gaya eesa khulee nishaaniyaan lekar, to kahaah main laaya hoon tumhaare paas gyaan aur taaki ujaagar kar doon tumhaare lie vah kuchh baaten, jinamen tum vibhed kar rahe ho. atah, allaah se daro aur mera hee kaha maano
vaastav mein, allaah hee mera paalanahaar tatha tumhaara paalanahaar hai. atah, usee kee vandana (ibaadat) karo yahee seedhee raah hai
phir vibhed kar liya girohon[1] ne aapas mein. to vinaash hai unake lie jinhonne atyaachaar kiya, duhkhadaayee din kee yaatana se
kya ve bas isakee prateeksha kar rahe hain ki pralay unapar sahasa aa pade aur unhen (usaka) sanvedan (bhee) na ho
sabhee mitr us din ek-doosare ke shatru ho jaayenge, aagyaakaariyon ke siva
he mere bhakto! koee bhay nahin hai tumapar aaj aur na tum udaaseen hoge
jo eemaan laaye hamaaree aayaton par tatha aagyaakaaree banakar rahe
pravesh kar jao svarg mein, tum tatha tumhaaree patniyaan. tumhen prasann rakha jaayega
phiraayee jaayengee unapar sone kee thaalen tatha pyaale aur usamen vah sab kuchh hoga, jise unaka man chaahega aur jise unakee aankhen dekhakar aanand lengee aur tumasab usamen sadaiv rahoge
aur ye svarg hai, jisake tum uttaraadhikaaree banaaye gaye ho, apane karmon ke badale, jo tum kar rahe the
tumhaare lie isamen bahut-se meve hain jinamen se tum khaate rahoge
nihsandeh aparaadhee narak kee yaatana mein sadaavaasee honge
unase (yaatana) halkee nahin kee jaayegee tatha ve usamen niraash honge
aur hamane atyaachaar nahin kiya unapar, parantu vahee atyaachaaree the
tatha ve pukaarenge ki he maalik![1] hamaara kaam hee tamaam kar de tera paraalanahaar. vah kahegaah tumhen isee dasha mein rahana hai
(allaah kahegaah) ham tumhaare paas saty[1] laaye, kintu tumamen se adhiktar ko saty apriy tha
kya unhonne kisee baat ka nirnay kar liya hai?[1] to ham bhee nirnay kar denge
kya ve samajhate hain ki ham nahin sunate hain unakee gupt baaton tatha praamarsh ko? kyon nahin, balki hamaare farishte unake paas hee likh rahe hain
(he nabee!) aap unase kah den ki yadi atyant krpaasheel (allaah) kee koee santaan hotee, to sabase pahale main usaka pujaaree hota
pavitr hai aakaashon tatha dharatee ka paalanahaar, sinhaasan ka svaamee un baaton se, jo ve kahate hain
to aap unhen chhod den, ve vaad-vivaad tatha khel-kood karate rahen, yahaan tak ki apane us din se mil jaayen, jisase unhen daraaya ja raha hai
vahee hai, jo aakaash mein vandaneey aur dharatee mein vandaneey hai aur vahee haikmat aur gyaan vaala hai
shubh hai vah, jisake adhikaar mein aakaashon tatha dharatee ka raajy hai tatha jo kuchh donon ke madhy hai tatha usee ke paas pralay ka gyaan hai aur usee kee or tumasab pratyaagat kiye jaoge
tatha nahin adhikaar rakhate hain, jinhen ve pukaarate hain allaah ke atirikt, sifaarish ka. haan, (sifaarish ke yogy ve hain) jo saty[1] kee gavaahee den aur (use) jaanate bhee hon
aur yadi aap unase prashn karen ki kisane paida kiya hai unhen? to ve avashy kahenge ki allaah ne. to phir ve kahaan phire ja rahe hain
tatha rasool kee ye baat ki, he mere paalanahaar! ye ve log hain, jo eemaan nahin laate
to aap unase vimukh ho jaayen tatha kah den ki salaam[1] hai. sheeghr hee unhen gyaan ho jaayega
haaa meem
shapath hai is khulee pustak kee
hamane hee utaara hai ise[1] ek shubh raatri mein. vaastav mein, ham saavadhaan karane vaale hain
usee (raatri) mein nirnay kiya jaata hai, pratyek sudrdh karm ka
ye (aadesh) hamaare paas se hai. ham hee bhejane vaale hain, rasoolon ko
aapake paalanahaar kee daya se, vaastav mein, vah sab kuchh sunane-jaanane vaala hai
jo aakaashon tatha dharatee ka paalanahaar hai tatha jo kuchh un donon ke beech hai, yadi tum vishvaas karane vaale ho
nahin hai koee vandaneey, parantu vahee, jo jeevan deta tatha maarata hai. tumhaara paalanahaar tatha tumhaare guzare hue poorvajon ka paalanahaar hai
balki, ve (mushrik) sandeh mein khel rahe hain
to aap prateeksha karen, us din ka, jab aakaash khula dhoonva[1] laayega
jo chha jaayega sab logon par. yahee duhkhadaayee yaatana hai
(ve kahengeh) hamaare paalanahaar! hamase yaatana door kar de. nishchay ham eemaan laane vaale hain
aur unake lie shiksha ka samay kahaan rah gaya? jabaki unake paas aa gaye ek rasool (saty ko) ujaagar karane vaale
phir bhee ve aapase munh pher gaye tatha kah diya ki ek sikhaaya hua paagal hai
ham door kar dene vaale hain kuchh yaatana, vaastav mein tum, phir apanee pratham sthiti par aa jaane vaale ho
jis din ham atyant kadee pakad[1] mein le lenge. to ham nishchay badala lene vaale hain
tatha hamane pareeksha lee inase poorv firaun kee jaati kee tatha unake paas ek aadaraneey rasool aaya
ki mujhe saump do allaah ke bhakton ko. nishchay main tumhaare lie ek amaanatadaar rasool hoon
tatha allaah ke vipareet ghamand na karo. main tumhaare saamane khula pramaan prastut karata hoon
tatha mainne sharan lee hai, apane paalanahaar kee tatha tumhaare paalanahaar kee isase ki tum mujhapar patharaav kar do
aur yadi tum mera vishvaas na karo, to mujhase pare ho jao
antatah, moosa ne pukaara apane paalanahaar ko, ki vaastav mein ye log aparaadhee hain
(hamane aadesh diya) ki nikal ja raaton-raat, mere bhakton ko lekar. nishchay tumhaara peechha kiya jaayega
tatha chhod de saagar ko usakee dasha par, khula. vaastav mein, ye doob jaane vaalee sena hai
ve chhod gaye bahut-se baag tatha jal srot
tatha khetiyaan aur sukhadaayee sthaan
tatha sukh ke saadhan, jinamen ve aannad le rahe the

to nahin roya unapar aakaash aur na dharatee aur na unhen avasar (samay) diya gaya

vaastav mein, ye[1] kahate hain ki
hamen to bas pratham baar marana hai tatha ham phir jeevit nahin kiye jaayenge

tatha hamane aakaashon aur dharatee ko evan jo kuchh un donon ke beech hai, khel nahin banaaya hai
hamane nahin paida kiya hai un donon ko, parantu saty ke aadhaar par. kintu adhiktar log ise nahin jaanate hain

jis din, koee saathee kisee saathee ke kuchh kaam nahin aayega aur na unakee sahaayata kee jaayegee
parantu, jisapar allaah kee daya ho jaaye, to vaastav mein vah bada prabhaavashaalee, dayaavaan hai
